msg: Minor bugfix: filling Summary field of JSON feed with Content rather than Description, if present.

author: bentmann

author: etnu
msg: Fixed bug causing incorrect link rewriting to take place due to confusion between MutableContent.setContent and Gadget.setContent by removing Gadget.setContent and making the rewriter return a String. Now gadget rewriting looks a lot closer to http request rewriting.
